channel.title: [508 Server] How Do I Change How Do I Change The NPCDialogue?
channel.description: I download butterscape 508 client, and everytime i log in and i talk to a npc it says welcome to butterscape, how do i change it where it says welcome to [your server name]?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2008, 03:46:49 am[/size][hr]bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2008, 03:52:54 am[/size][hr]bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2008, 04:13:56 am[/size][hr]bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2008, 04:14:23 am[/size][hr]bump

item.title: [508 Server] How Do I Change How Do I Change The NPCDialogue?
item.dc:creator: @anelm anelm
item.description:
@anelm wrote:

well if you see above it says

case 128://Doomsayer
p.dialogue = 19;
new NPCDialogue(Welcome to H0lyScape);
break;

change that and in other ones

new NPCDialogue(#);

put whatever u want them to say in there

Read full topic

item.title: [508 Server] How Do I Change How Do I Change The NPCDialogue?
item.dc:creator: @N0vlafe N0vlafe
item.description:
@N0vlafe wrote:

at there wat should i look for for example it says this /*

  • Class NPCOption1
  • Version 1.0
  • Friday, August 22, 2008
  • Created by Palidino76
    */

package palidino76.rs2.io.packets;

import palidino76.rs2.Engine;
import palidino76.rs2.players.Player;
import palidino76.rs2.util.Misc;
import palidino76.rs2.npcs.NPCDialogue;

public class NPCOption1 implements Packet {

/**
 * Handles the first NPC option.
 * @param p The Player which the frame should be handled for.
 * @param packetId The packet id this belongs to.
 * @param packetSize The amount of bytes being recieved for this packet.
 */
public void handlePacket(Player p, int packetId, int packetSize) {
    if (p == null || p.stream == null) {
        return;
    }
    if (!p.npcOption1) {
        int npcId = p.stream.readUnsignedWordA();

        if (npcId <= 0 || npcId >= Engine.npcs.length
                || Engine.npcs[npcId] == null) {
            return;
        }
        p.clickId = npcId;
        p.clickX = Engine.npcs[npcId].absX;
        p.clickY = Engine.npcs[npcId].absY;
 if (Misc.getDistance(p.absX, p.absY, p.clickX -= 2, p.clickY -= 2) > 30 || Misc.getDistance(p.absX, p.absY, p.clickX += 2, p.clickY += 2) > 30 ) {
            return;
        }
        p.npcOption1 = true;
    }
    if (p.clickId <= 0 || p.clickId >= Engine.npcs.length
            || Engine.npcs[p.clickId] == null) {
        p.npcOption1 = false;
        return;
    }
    if (Misc.getDistance(p.absX, p.absY, p.clickX, p.clickY) > 1) {
        return;
    }
    p.npcOption1 = false;

PlayerSlayer playSlay = new PlayerSlayer§;
switch (p.clickId) {

case 366:
p.dialogue = 54;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 361:
p.dialogue = 56;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 365:
p.dialogue = 53;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 364:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 29;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop29, p.shop29n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Boxed Armour Sales”, 278, 88);
break;

case 357:
p.dialogue = 49;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 356:
p.dialogue = 48;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 363:
p.dialogue = 51;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 362:
p.dialogue = 50;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 351:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 25;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop25, p.shop25n);
p.frames.setString(p, “The Pub”, 278, 88);
break;

case 342://thessalia
if(p.gender == 1) {
p.frames.showInterface(p, 594);
}
if(p.gender == 0) {
p.frames.showInterface(p, 591);
}
break;

case 353:
p.dialogue = 47;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 352:
p.dialogue = 46;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 343://Shop assistant
p.dialogue = 45;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 340:
case 341:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 6;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop6, p.shop6n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Varrock General Store”, 278, 88);
break;

case 337://Shop assistant
p.dialogue = 43;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 339:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 22;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop22, p.shop22n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Platebody Shop”, 278, 88);
break;

case 336://Shopkeeper
p.dialogue = 42;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 325://Hairdresser
p.dialogue = 40;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 324://Flynn
p.dialogue = 37;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 323://Herquin
p.dialogue = 39;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 321://Cassie
p.dialogue = 38;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 338:
p.dialogue = 44;
new NPCDialogue§;
break;

case 315:
case 316:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 6;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop6, p.shop6n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Falador General Store”, 278, 88);
break;

case 314:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 17;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop17, p.shop17n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Plateskirt Shop”, 278, 88);
break;

case 309:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 16;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop16, p.shop16n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Shantay Shop”, 278, 88);
break;

case 308:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 14;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop14, p.shop14n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Kebab Shop”, 278, 88);
break;

case 287:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 11;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop11, p.shop11n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Silk Shop”, 278, 88);
break;

case 302:
case 303:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 6;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop6, p.shop6n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Al-Kharid General Store”, 278, 88);
break;

case 264:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 2;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop2, p.shop2n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Range Shop”, 278, 88);
break;

case 263:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 4;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop4, p.shop4n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Fancy Dress Shop”, 278, 88);
break;
case 262:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 3;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop3, p.shop3n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Desert Gear”, 278, 88);
break;

case 260:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 5;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop5, p.shop5n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Rares Shop”, 278, 88);
break;

case 124:
case 125:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 6;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop6, p.shop6n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Lumbridge General Store”, 278, 88);
break;

case 172:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 7;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop7, p.shop7n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Tzhaar Gem Shop”, 278, 88);
break;

case 265:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 8;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop8, p.shop8n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Tzhaar Weapon Shop”, 278, 88);
break;

case 168:
p.viewings = 1;
p.shopid = 9;
p.frames.showInterface(p, 278);
p.frames.setItems(p, 278, 89, 94, p.shop9, p.shop9n);
p.frames.setString(p, “Tzhaar Rune Shop”, 278, 88);
break;

	case 304://Louie Legs
		p.dialogue = 36;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 288://Zeke
		p.dialogue = 35;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 255://Gee
		p.dialogue = 34;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 254://Gee
		p.dialogue = 32;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 252://Sabreen
		p.dialogue = 31;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 253://Jaraah
		p.dialogue = 30;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 251://A'abla
		p.dialogue = 29;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 250://Surgeon General
		p.dialogue = 28;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 249://Sloane
		p.dialogue = 27;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 248://Sloane
		p.dialogue = 26;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 247://Tzhaar-Ket
		p.dialogue = 25;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 208://strange old man
		p.dialogue = 24;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 169://Mej-Jal
		p.dialogue = 23;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 115://WC Tutor
		p.dialogue = 22;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 137://Pikkupstix
		p.dialogue = 21;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 126://Explorer Jack
		p.dialogue = 20;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 128://Doomsayer
		p.dialogue = 19;
		new NPCDialogue(Welcome to H0lyScape);
		break;

	case 116://Smelting tutor
		p.dialogue = 18;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 117://Smithing tutor
		p.dialogue = 17;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 80:
		playSlay.appendTargetPicking();
	break;

	case 127://fishing tutor
		p.dialogue = 16;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 113://melee tutor
		p.dialogue = 13;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 112://magic tutor
		p.dialogue = 15;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 114://ranged tutor
		p.dialogue = 14;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 56:
		p.dialogue = 0;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 79:
		p.dialogue = 5;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
	break;

	case 65:
		p.dialogue = 2;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
	break;

	case 66:
	p.setCoords(2552, 3558, 0);
		p.dialogue = 3;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
	break;

	case 64:
		p.dialogue = 1;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

	case 57:
		p.dialogue = 6;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;
	case 58:
		p.dialogue = 7;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;
	case 59:
		p.dialogue = 8;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;
	case 60:
		p.dialogue = 9;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;
	case 61:
		p.dialogue = 7;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;
	case 110:
		p.dialogue = 10;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;
	case 129:
		p.dialogue = 11;
		new NPCDialogue(p);
		break;

    default:
        Misc.println(
                "[" + p.username + "] Unhandled npc option 1: " + p.clickId);
        break;
    }
}

}

so how would i change the diolouge?
